document.full_text: roger federer's french open preparation hit a roadblock thursday with a 4-6, 7-6 (2), 7-6 (4) loss to richard gasquet in the third round of the italian open.
document.title: sports briefing | tennis : federer falls in rome
lines_and_colors: roger federer's french open preparation hit a roadblock thursday with a 4-6, 7-6 (2), 7-6 (4) loss to richard gasquet in the third round of the italian open.
